StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetO.cerWaiver]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@O.cerWaiverID int)
AS
SELECT ow.[OFFICER_WAIVER_ID] AS O.cerWaiverId ,ow.[NWA_ID] AS NwaId ,ow.[WAIVER_TYPE_ID] AS TypeId ,ow.[WAIVER_OCCASION_ID] AS OccasionId ,ow.[WAIVER_STATUS_CODE] AS StatusCode ,ws.[WAIVER_STATUS_DESC] AS StatusDescrip.on ,ow.[WAIVER_SUBMIT_DATE] AS SubmitDate ,ow.[WAIVER_DETAILS] AS Details ,ow.[CURRENT_WAIVER_LEVEL] AS CurrentLevel ,ow.[APPROVAL_NUMBER] AS ApprovalNumber ,ow.[APPROVAL_DATE] AS ApprovalDate ,ow.[DISAPPROVAL_DATE] AS DisapprovalDate ,ow.[SIGNED_BY] AS SignedBy ,ow.[SIGNED_BY_DIRECTION_OF] AS SignedByDirec.onOf FROM [dbo].[OFFICER_WAIVER] ow WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_STATUS] ws ON ws.[WAIVER_STATUS_CODE] = ow.[WAIVER_STATUS_CODE] WHERE [OFFICER_WAIVER_ID] = @O.cerWaiverID
